Posts.Content: Sorry hun . I'm thinking the near future at the minute, any further down the line I know anything is possible. Lisa xxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Day 4 post surgery

Posts.Content: It's definitely a strange journey. I've just been for wounds checking. All looks fine. I think I'll be more relaxed once I get the results on Thursday, at the moment everything feels up in the air , once I know what I'm facing Re treatment I'll have something to focus on that gets me nearer to the end of this part of my life. I feel better now the sticky patches have gone.  Exercise wise I still can't get my arm completely flat against the wall but it's getting there, slowly but surely. Thank you for all your replies, it's good to know this is how it feels for most xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Day 4 post surgery

Posts.Content: Day 4,  I've stopped the codeine hospital gave me as I wear a morphine patch anyway and that's doing the job well on its own. I had awful acid reflux for 3 nights, last night was the first restful nights sleep I've had. I'm just pottering around the house, hubby has taken over cooking/cleaning and laundry. I feel like a spare part.  My underarm and upper chest are still numb, but I'm getting the odd twinge there so I think it's 'defrosting' slowly lol. I keep looking at my flat part, it still doesn't feel real, I don't know what I'm expecting to be honest with you, it all happened so quickly, I guess I need to catch up with what is actually going on.  The only annoying thing is the light headedness if I stand up/walk around for longer than 10 minutes. Strange sensation, I'm 44............ feeling much older. Hope everyone else is doing well. Lisa
Posts.Title: Day 4 post surgery

Posts.Content: I know exactly what you mean, as the days getting closer I'm getting more worried. Hugs Mrs xxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Post left mastectomy breast surgery results- worried

Posts.Content: Hi Deb, I know you're a couple of days in front of me, my results Thursday, I have no clue what type/grade etc I never wanted to know before hand, as it's not anything I could do anything about. I just wanted to send love and hugs to you lovely xxxxx
Posts.Title: Post left mastectomy breast surgery results- worried

Posts.Content: Mine was exactly the same, Dr took 3 biopsies and my boob was sore for a few weeks afterwards so I think this is normal, I did wonder if it was because I was anxious over waiting for results so noticed it more , sending gentle hugs xxx
Posts.Title: Pain after biopsy, normal?
